qrem
0.2.0

  • qrem package API
    • Subpackages
      • qrem.benchmarks
      • qrem.characterization
      • qrem.cn
      • qrem.common
        • This subpackage qrem.common provides a suite of utility modules specifically tailored for the QREM project. It encompasses a range of functionalities from configuration loading to mathematical computations and file operations in the context of Quantum Error Mitigation (QEM).
        • Subpackages
        • Submodules
      • qrem.ctmp
      • qrem.mitigation
      • qrem.pipelines
      • qrem.providers
      • qrem.qtypes

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_triang_ineqs(spins)

Generate the list of triangle inequalities involving the given spin variables

Parameters:

spins (list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of spin variables

Returns:

list of sympy.core.add.Add

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_det_guess(s_variables, cliques, Mom, one, two)

Obtains the closest spin configuration from the moment matrix resulting from the lower bound SDP

Parameters:

  • s_variables (list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of spin variables

  • cliques (list of lists of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of the cliques of the chordal extension

  • Mom (list of numpy.ndarray) – the block moment matrix at level 1

  • one (list of list of float) – coefficients of the one-body terms in the hamiltonian

  • two – coefficients of the two-body terms in the hamiltonian as a matrix

Returns:

the deterministic configuration final_config as list of floats

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_bound_from_det(config, one, two)

Gets the energy of the corresponding configuration

Parameters:

  • config (list of float) – the spin configuration

  • one (list of list of float) – coefficients of the one-body terms in the hamiltonian

  • two – coefficients of the two-body terms in the hamiltonian as a matrix

Returns:

the upper bound to the ground state energy as float

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_strengthen_low(s_variables, substitutions, hamiltonian, cliques, threshold, solverparameters=None, verbose=0)

Runs the relaxation for the first time and determines how many triangle inequalities to add to get a reasonably good lower bound. Outputs the corresponding lower bound as well

Parameters:

  • s_variables (list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of spin variables

  • substitutions (dict of items of polynomials of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – substitution to be applied in the generation of the moment matrix at the level of operators

  • hamiltonian (sympy.core.add.Add) – hamiltonian of the problem as a symbolic polynomial of the spins

  • cliques (list of lists of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of the cliques of the chordal extension

  • threshold (int) – threshold clique size n_t under which generats blocks at level 2

  • solverparameters (dict) – parameters for the SDP solver

  • verbose (int) – verbosity level

Returns:

sdp as ncpol2sdpa sdp class, list of triangle inequalities to add as

list of sympy.core.add.Add

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_Mom(sdp, cliques)

Extract the level 1 moment matrix from the solved sdp problem

Parameters:

  • spd – SDP problem generated by ncpol2sdpa

  • cliques (list of lists of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of the cliques of the chordal extension

Returns:

the level 1 the block moment matrix Mom as list of numpy.ndarray,

the average spin values as list of numpy.ndarray

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_up_and_low(s_variables, substitutions, ineqs, hamiltonian, one, two, cliques, threshold, solverparameters=None, verbose=0)

Gets upper and lower bound for the given instance of branching

Parameters:

  • s_variables (list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of spin variables

  • substitutions (dict of items of polynomials of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – substitution to be applied in the generation of the moment matrix at the level of operators

  • ineqs (list of sympy.core.add.Add) – triangle inequalities to be added to improve the lower bound

  • hamiltonian (sympy.core.add.Add) – hamiltonian of the problem as a symbolic polynomial of the spins

  • one (list of floats) – coefficients for the one-body terms in the hamiltonian

  • two (list of floats) – coefficients for the two-body terms in the hamiltonian

  • cliques (list of lists of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of the cliques of the chordal extension

  • threshold (int) – threshold clique size n_t under which generats blocks at level 2

  • solverparameters (dict) – parameters for the SDP solver

  • verbose (int) – verbosity level

Returns:

lower bound as float, upper bound as float, spin expectation values

extracted from the moment matrix for each clique as list of array of floats, the deterministic configuration for each spin as list of floats

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_branching_node(spins, s_variables, cliques, eqs)

Gets the spin on which to perform the next branching. Works with an “easy-first” choice

Parameters:

  • spins (list of floats) – the spin average values extracted from the moment matrix

  • s_variables (list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of spin variables

  • cliques (list of lists of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of the cliques of the chordal extension

  • eqs (list of sympy.core.add.Add) – list of already implemented branching choices

Returns:

the spin variable of the branching node as sympy.core.symbol.Symbol

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_as_coeffs(hamiltonian, s_variables)

Extracts the one and two-body coefficients from the symbolic hamiltonian

Parameters:

  • hamiltonian (sympy.core.add.Add) – hamiltonian of the problem as a symbolic polynomial of the spins

  • s_variables (list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of spin variables

Returns:

the one-body coeffs as list of float, the two-body coeffs as list

of list of float

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_sup(s_variables, eqs)

Gets the spin variables on which the branching has alreadu been performed

Parameters:

  • s_variables (list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of spin variables

  • eqs (list of sympy.core.add.Add) – list of already implemented branching choices

Returns:

support of the branching equations as list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol

qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools.get_groundBandB(s_variables, substitutions, hamiltonian, cliques, threshold=3, verbose=0)

Runs the whole branch&bound algorithm for the given hamiltonian

Parameters:

  • s_variables (list of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of spin variables

  • substitutions (dict of items of polynomials of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – substitution to be applied in the generation of the moment matrix at the level of operators

  • hamiltonian (sympy.core.add.Add) – hamiltonian of the problem as a symbolic polynomial of the spins

  • cliques (list of lists of sympy.core.symbol.Symbol) – list of the cliques of the chordal extension

  • threshold (int) – threshold clique size n_t under which generats blocks at level 2

  • solverparameters (dict) – parameters for the SDP solver

  • verbose (int) – verbosity level

Returns z_low:

final lower bound as float

Returns z_up:

final upper bound as float

Returns final_config:

final ground state configuration as list of floats
